# NSPrefPaneIconFile

**Property List Key**

The name of an image file used to represent a preference pane in the System Preferences app.

## Preferences

- **NSPrefPaneIconLabel**: The name of a preference pane displayed beneath the preference pane icon in the System Preferences app.
